content: "I wonder why you always lose just one sock out of a pair." "If you lost both, you wouldn't notice it, right?" "Yeah, I guess you're right."
translations: ita:Mi chiedo perché tu perda sempre un solo calzino di un paio. Se li perdessi entrambi, non lo noteresti, vero﹖ Sì, immagi
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by CK (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
